place.name: LLANVIHANGEL TOR Y MYNYDD
place.gazetteerText: LLANVIHANGEL-TOR-Y-MYNYDD, a parish in Chepstow district, Monmouth; 3½ miles ESE of Llandenny r. station and 5¾ E by N of Usk. Post town, Chepstow. Acres, 1,031. Real property, £1,056. Pop., 197. Houses, 45. The property is subdivided. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Llandaff. Value, £89. Patron, the Archdeacon of Llandaff. The church is good. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
